Election Information

[Internet Posting Requirements for Political Subdivisions](https://www.eastbernardtx.com/upload/page/0181/Internet%20Posting%20Requirements%20for%20Political%20Subdivision.pdf)

* [Notice of Deadline to File Applications for Place on the Ballot](https://www.eastbernardtx.com/upload/page/0203/2026%20Notice%20of%20Deadline%20to%20File%20An%20Application%20for%20Place%20on%20Ballot_0001.pdf)
* Order of Election for City of East Bernard
* Notice of Drawing for Place on Ballot

*Thank you for seeking to serve your city. The below documents are to aid in your preparation for filing for office.*

*Candidate Packets are available at City Hall if you prefer hard copies.*

* [2024 Election Calendar](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/laws/advisory2022-37.shtml)
* [Application For A Place on the Ballot](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/forms/pol-sub/2-21f.pdf)
* [Guide to Campaign Finance](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/resources/guides/coh_local_guide.pdf)
* [2024 Filing Schedule](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/filinginfo/schedules/s23uniform.pdf)
* [Appointing a Campaign Treasurer](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/forms/coh/e_cta.pdf)
  [(Instructions)](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/forms/coh/CTA_ins.pdf)
* [Campaign Finance Reports](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/forms/coh/coh.pdf)
  [(Instructions)](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/forms/coh/COH_ins22.pdf)
* [Fair Campaign Practices](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/forms/coh/cfcp.pdf)
  [(Fair Campaign Practices Act)](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/statutes/ch258.pdf)
* [Political Advertising](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/resources/advertising/Gpol_adv.pdf)
  [(Prohibition of Using Political Subdivision Resources for Political Advertising)](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/resources/advertising/Bsub_adv.pdf)
* [Campaign Signs](https://www.txdot.gov/inside-txdot/division/right-of-way/campaign-signs.html)
